mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.NAME, C.TITLE, WRITTEN_DATE, C.VIEWS, C.CONTENT, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME FROM COMPANY_BOARD C JOIN MEMBER ON(C.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN POSITION P USING(POSITION_NO) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
